nodes.text: Rengor Talke was a scout serving on the Imperial Survey Corps Far*Reach IV PQR Wanderer at the time of its crash on the crystalline world of Isis.

Rengor Talke was a large, threatening slave fighter on a planet visited by the Wanderer's crew. Impressed with his abilities, the crew adopted Talke into their group, where he becoming a valuable crew mate.
Talke was quiet and methodical, but frightening when enraged.
